findings.title: AML strategy is not supported
findings.description: The app does not have access to the AML security policy and cannot synchronize malicious addresses to users in a timely manner.

findings.title: Phishing detect warning is not supported
findings.description: The application does not support phishing detect warnings.

findings.title: Pre-execution result display is not supported
findings.description: The application does not support pre-execution result display.

findings.title: Contact whitelisting is not supported
findings.description: The contact whitelisting is not supported, causing similar address attacks.

findings.title: Password complexity limit is not set
findings.description: There is no password complexity limit.

findings.title: Enhanced mnemonic verification
findings.description: When creating a wallet, the user is required to confirm whether the mnemonic phrase is backed up completely. The app only requires the user to verify 1 of the 12 mnemonic phrases, and this verification method needs to be strengthened.

findings.title: Inadequate mnemonic phrase backup verification
findings.description: When creating a wallet, the user is required to confirm whether the mnemonic phrase is backed up completely. The app only requires the user to verify 1 of the 12 mnemonic phrases, and this verification method needs to be strengthened.
